titles.title: Expressing the Sense of the Congress that the Federal Government should not create a national database tracking firearm owners or firearm purchases.
Expressing the Sense of the Congress that the Federal Government should not create a national database tracking firearm owners or firearm purchases.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of Congress that the federal government should not create a national database to track firearm owners or purchases.
